reviewText: Bought it to give my cousin for his birthday this month, was pleased with quick shipping. I'm a deaf parent of hearing son and he knows asl but my soon to be 7 years old really want to learn ASL so he can communicate with me while I babysit him. This DVD is perfect for kids to learn the basic.
Good.. I would like to see deaf children and children of deaf parents (coda) comic ate on that.
